Posted By: Qazior (6/18/2011 3:25:17 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Awesome Story, that I swear to God is True: I was thinking up what sort of deck list I might pick for the Black-White-Red deck after I saw the spoiler for Kaalia of the Vast. Based only on I thought the arts looked awesome for the tone that kind of deck wants, I called:  
  
Akroma, Angel of Fury  
Malfegor  
and this.  
I also remember wanting to put either Firemane Angel or Razia Boros Archangel in, but I guess that's what Basandra's for instead.  
I also wanted Reiver Demon again, but they made a better version with dumb art. the art is the only reason I play Reiver Demon. he's from Mirrodin, but for a reason I can't explain his art looks like it belongs to Ravnica, the best \*\*\* most BEAUTIFUL set Magic has ever had.   
the name is why I pick Lord of the Pit over Xathrid Demon EVERY time.   
Im a Vorthos, and I love anything that seems gothicly epic. Ravnica art style FTW 4EVR!  
I wish all Magic art used the Ravnica style guide. it was just full of win. you can illustrate non-city scenes with th... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content:
Still a good card. Never liked the art though, :/  
I think it's her face and head-shape, it just looks a little infantile, y'know?  
The angel of mother-flupping despair should look really badass, and that head just ain't doing it for me.
posts.html:
Still a good card. Never liked the art though, :/
I think it's her face and head-shape, it just looks a little infantile, y'know?
The angel of mother-flupping despair should look really badass, and that head just ain't doing it for me.

posts.post_content: Costs 2 more black mana than Archon of Justice and doesn't exile the target permanent, but triggers when entering the battlefield and gets +1/+1. Also an Angel. Not a competitive card in the least, but a fine card for casual.
posts.html:
Costs 2 more black mana than Archon of Justice and doesn't exile the target permanent, but triggers when entering the battlefield and gets +1/+1. Also an Angel. Not a competitive card in the least, but a fine card for casual.

Posted By: blindthrall (7/20/2011 12:12:35 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: She's also a solid casual reanimator target. Her ability to kill anything on the board is amazing. Also great with recuring CIP effects such as the already mentioned [Momentary Blink](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Momentary Blink). Also see [Recurring Nightmare](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Recurring Nightmare).
posts.html:
